page.title: 14THE LIVERPOOL RINGROAD
page.content: THE A5058 IS THE LIVERPOOL RING ROAD.IT IS USUALLY REFERRED TO AS QUEENS DRIVE AND IT GOES FROM SEFTON PARK IN THE SOUTH OF THE CITY TO WALTON IN THE NORTH.QUEENS DRIVE IS A DUAL CARRIAGEWAY,HAVING TWO LANES OF TRAFFIC IN EACH DIRECTION.IT IS A VERY BUSY ROAD.WE DID A FIFTEEN MINUTE TRAFFIC SURVEY AT THE QUEENS DRIVE, MUIRHEAD AVENUE JUNCTION. { { TOWARDS WALTON * FROM WALTON} {CARS.........231 * 173 {BUSES........ 3 * 8 {MOTOR CYCLES. 2 * 1 {TAXIS........ 11 * 8 {VANS......... 25 * 24 {BICYCLES..... 1 * 0 {LORRIES...... 36 * 31 THE JUNCTION HAS RECENTLY BEEN WIDENED TO COPE WITH THE INCREASED TRAFFIC. SOME OF THE COST CAME FROM THE{E.E.C. {(EUROPEAN REGIONAL DEVELOPMENT FUND)
